projects.title: DapurKita - Malaysian Home Cooking Marketplace
projects.description: Discover authentic Malaysian flavors and connect with talented home-based cooks in your neighborhood. Experience the warmth of Malaysian hospitality through authentic, homemade dishes crafted with love. Delivering to Kuala Lumpur and surrounding areas with 500+ home cooks and 2,000+ dishes available.

projects.title: Task Management Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features that improved productivity by 45%.

projects.title: Healthcare Mobile App
projects.description: A React Native app with secure authentication, appointment booking, and medical record access that reduced scheduling time by 60%.

projects.title: SaaS Analytics Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for SaaS businesses with real-time metrics, user tracking, and revenue insights.

projects.title: Social Media Manager
projects.description: A social media management tool that allows scheduling posts, analyzing engagement, and managing multiple accounts from one dashboard.
